name: Hitwicket Superstars
description:
Lead Engineer of this game while working at Hitwicket. 

Tune in to the next generation of 3D Mobile Cricket Games that Combines Strategy & Sports like nothing else before! With Hitwicket Superstars, you can own a team of Cricketing Superstars, play epic T20 Cricket Matches & battle it out in Multiplayer Championships with a million cricket fans world wide. Made in India, for India & the World!

Be a Cricket Team Owner, Captain & Coach as you train your Cricket players from Rookies into World Class Superstars. Represent the Indian Cricket Team or select from a host of National Cricket Teams - Australia, England or South Africa - in your quest for the World Cup.

Face off against the world’s greatest bowlers, bash ‘n’ smash your favorite shots & watch the ball disappear into the crowd. Engage with a global cricket loving fan community and make memories competing in Multiplayer World Championships.

Bid for a World Class Batsman & the Best Bowlers in real time Auctions. Play the Career Mode & Dominate the World by participating in the World Tour. Compete in real Multiplayer Tournaments & International Premier League Championships to lift the World Cup in one of the most exciting Android Cricket Games of 2021!

Download today for free & play without WiFi - offline or online!
